author: apetrelli
msg: Added links to download Tiles 2.1.4 and 2.2.1.

author: bentmann
msg: [MNG-4221] Push all repository/artifact related code into a legacy module and create a backward compat layer for external consumers
o Refactored code to make maven-compat depend on maven-core, this got ugly regarding some tests which to a high degree depend on a full-blown repository system

author: aconway
msg: client::ConnectionImpl used to contain a FailoverListener to subscribe
for updates on the amq.failover exchange. This caused some lifecycle
Now FailoverListener is a public API class that the user must create
associated with a session to get known-broker updates.
Removed the weak_ptr logic in client::SessionImpl which was only
Made SessionImpl::close() idempotent. Gets rid of spurious warning
